meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Labridae family of fish.
meanings.sent1: The labroids fish have colorful scales.
meanings.sent2: Labroids species can be found in coral reefs.
meanings.sent3: The labroids fish threw a party in the coral reef.
meanings.sent4: The labroids fish danced gracefully among the corals.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant labroids fish stood out in the ocean.

meanings.definition: A fish belonging to the Labridae family.
meanings.sent1: I saw a labroids swimming in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: Labroids are known for their unique patterns.
meanings.sent3: The labroids fish told jokes to the clownfish.
meanings.sent4: The labroids fish ruled the underwater kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The labroids fish swam elegantly in the sea.
